name: io.github.gitguardian/ggmcp
description: GitGuardian MCP server that enables AI agents to scan projects for secrets using GitGuardian's API with 500+ secret detectors, manage security incidents, and create honeytokens

environmentVariables.description: GitGuardian instance URL (defaults to https://dashboard.gitguardian.com for US SaaS)
environmentVariables.name: GITGUARDIAN_URL

environmentVariables.description: OAuth client ID for custom OAuth applications
environmentVariables.name: GITGUARDIAN_CLIENT_ID

environmentVariables.description: OAuth scopes to request (auto-detected by default)
environmentVariables.name: GITGUARDIAN_SCOPES
